name: Money Order
description:
Money Order is my entry for simmer jam 2, which happened on November 8-10, 2019. The theme of the jam was "Money," so I made a game that challenges the player's ability to memorize items in a specific order. In the game, you control a coin and use your self to acquire an item.

During this jam, the participants are also encouraged to use a new web monetization feature from coil. Of course, I implemented it! The idea that I came up with was to unlocked a specific feature as a means of appreciation. Then, for every minute that the game got monetized, I also give the player a token, which is a second currency to buy items in the shop.

HOW TO PLAY
Remember the items in your inventory, then you (the coin/ player) will have to get them base on a specific order. The more items you need to collect, the higher the coins you earn. However, if you feel despair and hopelessness, consider restarting the level.

CONTROLS
Movement:  A/Left Arrow Key or D/Right Arrow Key
Jump: Space Bar
Dash: Press a movement key twice
